title: Game Scoop Episode 643
description: On this episode of Game Scoop! we discuss our impressions of Arkane's Deathloop and go over the week's hardware update news around the Nintendo Switch and the PS5. We also muse over a hypothetical world in which one console could rule them all, and brainstorm ideas around what game developers we think could take on games around various Pixar or Disney properties. Plus video game 20 questions! Scoop!
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)

Plus video game 20 questions! Scoop!
